issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Android: Kitchen Sink: Webviews -> Image Url - Pinch and Zoom does not work.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Navigate to KitchenSink:Views>Web Views>Image URL
2. 2:Tap on the zoom in and zoom out.

Expected:
Should be able to see change in the image size
fields.summary: Android: Kitchen Sink: Webviews -> Image Url - Pinch and Zoom does not work.
fields.environment:
Device: Samsung tablet , Android version: 3.2
SDK: 3.1.0.v20130404173046
CLI version : 3.1.0-beta
OS : MAC OSX 10.7.5
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.1.0.201304011603

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
